body:
The switch to `params` instead of `routeParams` actually fixes this without `withRouter`. [`routeParams`](https://github.com/reactjs/react-router/blob/master/docs/API.md#routeparams) is a subset of `params` that only has parameters for the component's route. Since we nest routes now, the `id` parameter is lost in `routeParams` but remains in `params`.

Remove the `withRouter` stuff and I think this is the right fix. Nice work!
